mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_info (SC_NAME, SC_SITE, SC_URL, SC_TYPE, SC_EXT, SC_MAXSIZE, SC_STATE, SC_COUNT, SC_COUNT_E, USER_ID, INPUT_DATE) VALUES (#{SC_NAME}, #{SC_SITE}, #{SC_URL}, #{SC_TYPE}, #{SC_EXT}, #{SC_MAXSIZE}, 0, 0,0,#{USER_ID},now());
mapper.select: SELECT T.SID, T.SC_NAME, T.SC_SITE, T.SC_URL, T.SC_TYPE, T.SC_EXT, T.SC_MAXSIZE, CASE WHEN T.SC_STATE = 0 THEN '대기' WHEN T.SC_STATE = 1 THEN '진행' WHEN T.SC_STATE = 3 THEN '취소' ELSE '완료' END SC_STATE, T.SC_COUNT, T.SC_COUNT_E, T.USER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(T.INPUT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') INPUT_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(T.END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') END_DATE FROM schedule_info T WHERE 1=1 AND T.SID = #{SID}
